member.name: T:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Prep.Func.ExportFunction
member.summary: Azure Function App triggered by messages from a Service Bus queue. This function exports notification in a zip file for the admin. It prepares the file by reading the notification data, user graph api. This function stage the file in Blob Storage and send the file card to the admin using bot framework adapter.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Azure Function App triggered by messages from a Service Bus queue. It kicks off the durable orchestration for exporting notifications.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Prep.Func.PreparingToSend.PrepareToSendOrchestrator
member.summary:
Prepare to Send orchestrator.
This function prepares to send a notification to the target audience.
Performs following: 1. Stores the message in sending notification table. 2. Syncs recipients information to sent notification table. 3. Creates teams conversation with recipients if required. 4. Starts Data aggregation. 5. Starts Send Queue orchestration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Prep.Func.PreparingToSend.PrepareToSendOrchestrator.RunOrchestrator(Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.IDurableOrchestrationContext,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: This is the durable orchestration method, which kicks off the preparing to send process.
member.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.CompanyCommunicator.Prep.Func.PreparingToSend.Orchestrators.SendQueueOrchestrator
member.summary:
Send Queue orchestrator.
Does following: 1. Reads all the recipients from Sent notification tables. 2. Sends messages to Send Queue in batches.
